      • getReceipt

        public static HederaTransactionReceipt getReceipt​(HederaTransactionID hederaTransactionID,
                                                  HederaNode node)
                                           throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        retrieves a receipt for a transaction, sleeps 1 second between attempts returns the last HederaTransactionReceipt received. tries 10 times and aborts if not successful
        Parameters:
        hederaTransactionID - the transaction id to get a receipt for
        node - the node to communicate with
        Returns:
        HederaTransactionReceipt
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - in the event of a node communication issue

      • getReceipt

        public static HederaTransactionReceipt getReceipt​(HederaTransactionID hederaTransactionID,
                                                  HederaNode node,
                                                  int maxRetries,
                                                  int firstDelay,
                                                  int increaseDelay)
                                           throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        retrieves a receipt for a transaction returns the last HederaTransactionReceipt received.
        Parameters:
        hederaTransactionID - the transaction id to get a receipt for
        node - the node to communicate with
        maxRetries - the maximum number of times the method will retry
        firstDelay - the time in milliseconds before the first getReceipt is sent
        increaseDelay - the time in milliseconds to increase the delay by between each retry
        Returns:
        HederaTransactionReceipt
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - in the event of a node communication issue

        Parameters:
        objectType - a string describing the object being checked which will be included in the error message

        Throws:
